name: Shadow Leagues
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

spells.name: Psy-Emowerment
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get AP(1) when attacking once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)
once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Nightmare Vision
spells.effect: Pick one enemy model within 24", which takes 1 hit with AP(4).

spells.name: Obscuring Energy
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Shadow Operative Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Shadow Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 12", which take 1 hit with AP(2) each.

spells.name: Dark Mist
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which get -1 to hit rolls when attacking once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)
once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Psychic Overload
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Fragment each.

specialRules.name: Stealth Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Stealth. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, place this model anywhere fully within 6" of its position.

specialRules.name: Takedown Strike
specialRules.description: Once per game, when it's this model's turn to attack in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make one attack at Quality 2+ with AP(2) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Precision Target
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. Friendly units get +X to hit rolls when attacking it.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shadow Operative
specialRules.description: Enemies get -4" range when trying to shoot at units where all models have this rule, and -2" movement when trying to charge units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Shadow Operative Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Shadow Operative Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Shred when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Shred when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fearless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fearless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Precision Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which gets -1 to hit rolls when attacking once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Fragment
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 4+, this weapon gets AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Shadow Operative Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Shadow Operative, enemies get -8" range when shooting  them and -4" movement when charging them from Shadow Operative (instead of only -4" and -2").

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

specialRules.name: Fear
specialRules.description: This model counts as having dealt +X wounds when checking wound effects in melee (must deal at least one wound).

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.
